summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BetGenius EPL Sports Betting Analytics MVP. Fixed critical backend MongoDB ObjectId serialization issues. All core functionality verified including dashboard stats, model management, picks generation, journal operations, and bet settlement.

resolved_issues.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error in POST endpoints
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Added ObjectId filtering and proper HTTP status codes (201)
resolved_issues.impact: Fixed model creation and journal entry creation

passed_tests: All backend API endpoints (31/31 tests passed)
Models tab with preset models display
CRUD operations for models and journal entries

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor selector issues in automated testing, but manual verification shows full functionality)
